AccountSasParameters AccountSasParameters Class

In this Article

Edit

The parameters to list SAS credentials of a storage account.

AccountSasParameters(String, String, String, DateTime, String, Nullable<HttpProtocol>, Nullable<DateTime>, String)
AccountSasParameters(String, String, String, DateTime, String, Nullable(Of HttpProtocol), Nullable(Of DateTime), String)

Initializes a new instance of the AccountSasParameters class.

Properties summary

IPAddressOrRange
IPAddressOrRange

Gets or sets an IP address or a range of IP addresses from which to accept requests.
KeyToSign
KeyToSign

Gets or sets the key to sign the account SAS token with.
Permissions
Permissions

Gets or sets the signed permissions for the account SAS. Possible values include: Read (r), Write (w), Delete (d), List (l), Add (a), Create (c), Update (u) and Process (p). Possible values include: 'r', 'd', 'w', 'l', 'a', 'c', 'u', 'p'
Protocols
Protocols

Gets or sets the protocol permitted for a request made with the account SAS. Possible values include: 'https,http', 'https'
ResourceTypes
ResourceTypes

Gets or sets the signed resource types that are accessible with the account SAS. Service (s): Access to service-level APIs; Container (c): Access to container-level APIs; Object (o): Access to object-level APIs for blobs, queue messages, table entities, and files. Possible values include: 's', 'c', 'o'
Services
Services

Gets or sets the signed services accessible with the account SAS. Possible values include: Blob (b), Queue (q), Table (t), File (f). Possible values include: 'b', 'q', 't', 'f'
SharedAccessExpiryTime
SharedAccessExpiryTime

Gets or sets the time at which the shared access signature becomes invalid.
SharedAccessStartTime
SharedAccessStartTime

Gets or sets the time at which the SAS becomes valid.

Validate()

    public AccountSasParameters(string services, string resourceTypes, string permissions, DateTime sharedAccessExpiryTime, string iPAddressOrRange = null, HttpProtocol? protocols = null, DateTime? sharedAccessStartTime = null, string keyToSign = null)Public Sub New(services As String, resourceTypes As String, permissions As String, sharedAccessExpiryTime As Date, iPAddressOrRange As String = Nothing, protocols As HttpProtocol? = Nothing, sharedAccessStartTime As Date? = Nothing, keyToSign As String = Nothing)

    Parameters

    • services
      String
      String

      The signed services accessible with the account SAS. Possible values include: Blob (b), Queue (q), Table (t), File (f). Possible values include: 'b', 'q', 't', 'f'

    • resourceTypes
      String
      String

      The signed resource types that are accessible with the account SAS. Service (s): Access to service-level APIs; Container (c): Access to container-level APIs; Object (o): Access to object-level APIs for blobs, queue messages, table entities, and files. Possible values include: 's', 'c', 'o'

    • permissions
      String
      String

      The signed permissions for the account SAS. Possible values include: Read (r), Write (w), Delete (d), List (l), Add (a), Create (c), Update (u) and Process (p). Possible values include: 'r', 'd', 'w', 'l', 'a', 'c', 'u', 'p'

    • sharedAccessExpiryTime
      DateTime
      DateTime

      The time at which the shared access signature becomes invalid.

    • iPAddressOrRange
      String
      String

      An IP address or a range of IP addresses from which to accept requests.

    • protocols
      Nullable<HttpProtocol>
      Nullable(Of HttpProtocol)

      The protocol permitted for a request made with the account SAS. Possible values include: 'https,http', 'https'

    • sharedAccessStartTime
      Nullable<DateTime>
      Nullable(Of DateTime)

      The time at which the SAS becomes valid.

    • keyToSign
      String
      String

      The key to sign the account SAS token with.
